department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 4, 2023 at 2:00PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
===============

[Title and Bid Information]
----------------------------
**Notice No.: WS3779662490-Doc3790177793**
**Request for Proposal - Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Hydrogen Analyzer**

[English] | [French]
-------------------------------
**English**                  |  **Français**
**Notice Publié le**        |  **Date de publication: 14 December 2022**
**Tender Closing Date** | **Date de cloture des offres: 04 January 2023, 2:00PM EST** 

**Bidder's Information**
------------------------
Any bid submitted after 2:00 PM EST on January 4, 2023 will be considered non-responsive. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit proposals for the acquisition of an oxygen, nitrogen, and hydrogen analyzer.

**Notice ID and Solicitation Document**
-------------------------------
**Notice ID: WS3779662490-Doc3790177793**
**Solicitation Document:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14896457?extsite=MTQ4OTY0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14896457?extsite=MTQ4OTY0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Bid Details**
----------------
The proposed contract falls under the category of Gas analyzers and monitors (UNSPC Code 41113100) and is subject to competitive bidding. The procurement method is competitive and open to all interested parties. The selection criteria are based on the lowest price.

**Eligibility and Rights**
-------------------------
This procurement is open to all eligible suppliers and contractors. The following trade agreements are applicable: the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact: Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

I hope the reformatting meets your expectations. I retained the original information in a concise and professional manner. Let me know if you'd like any further changes.
